info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 27 at 10:00AM MDT until March 28 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical fire weather conditions possible Monday afternoon... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. * Timing...During the afternoon hours on Monday March 28. * Winds...Southwest at 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 15 percent. * Temperatures...Around 80 degrees. * Impacts...Unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not advised on Monday. If dangerous fire weather conditions appear imminent, a Red Flag Warning will be issued.
